title: Exercise: Build a Shared Library of Custom Transformers

questions.question: What value did you get for the longest AverageLength at the end of step 5, rounded to the nearest whole number?
If you also wanted this custom transformer to provide a single feature with just the LengthAverage attribute, which of the following methods would work?
options: Add a connection between the StatisticsCalculator:Summary port and a new custom transformer output object named Summary.
Add a connection between the StatisticsCalculator:Summary port and the Output port.
Add a Sampler after the StatisticsCalculator.
Add a Tester after the StatisticsCalculator testing for values of LengthAverage under a certain threshold provided by a user parameter.
